summary.introduction: Experienced frontend developer with 8+ years of expertise in React, TypeScript, and modern web technologies. Passionate about creating user-centric applications and leading high-performing teams.
highlights: Expert in React, TypeScript, and modern JavaScript
Proven track record of leading high-performing teams
Strong focus on user experience and performance optimization

projects.title: Tech Corp - SaaS Platform
projects.description: Led frontend architecture for flagship SaaS platform serving 100K+ users. Implemented micro-frontend architecture reducing load times by 40%.
achievements: Reduced application load time by 40% through code splitting and lazy loading
Led team of 5 developers in agile environment
Implemented comprehensive testing strategy with 95% code coverage

projects.title: Startup Inc - Web Applications
projects.description: Built responsive web applications using React and modern JavaScript. Collaborated with UX/UI designers to implement pixel-perfect designs.
achievements: Developed 3 major product features from concept to deployment
Improved mobile performance by 35% through optimization

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
